Welcome to my webpage!

Ph.D. in Computer Science from the Université Clermont Auvergne (UCA), France. My thesis, entitled "Optimization strategies for the integrated routing and inventory management problem", is available here.

I'm also charged of courses including C programming, numerical analysis, operational research, systems modeling and optimization, graphs etc. for undergraduate students at UCA and ISIMA.
